data.title: Drama, Film and Theatre Studies
data.meta_description: Development has commenced on a new specification for Leaving Certificate Drama, Film and Theatre Studies.
data.text:
The Draft Specification for Leaving Certificate Drama, Film & Theatre Studies was approved for public consultation and it ran from 2nd February - 5th April 2024.

Draft Specification for Leaving Certificate Drama, Film and Theatre Studies

The consultation involved in-depth engagement with a wide variety of stakeholders across Ireland. NCCA have also contacted schools to participate in school-based focus groups involving teachers, students and school leaders.

This consultation has now closed.

The feedback from this consultation will help to inform the work of the Development Group for Leaving Certificate Drama, Film and Theatre Studies in refining the draft specification prior to final approval and publication.

The first step in the development of Leaving Certificate Drama, Film and Theatre Studies was the research and publication of a Background paper and Brief for the review of the subject.

Background Paper and Brief for the Review of Leaving Certificate Drama, Film and Theatre Studies.

A public consultation on the Background paper and brief took place from 5th September 2022 to 28th October 2022.

The Consultation Report on the Background Paper for Leaving Certificate Drama, Film and Theatre Studies

The development group for Leaving Certificate Drama, Film and Theatre Studies was convened on 27th September 2022 and will progress the development of a new specification guided by the brief and the findings of the consultation on the Background paper.

Leaving Certificate Drama, Film and Theatre Studies will be developed to support the realisation of the purpose and vision for a redeveloped senior cycle as set out the Senior Cycle Review: Advisory Report (NCCA, 2022). The guiding principles, as described in the Advisory Report, provide a touchstone for the Development Group as they undertake the task of preparing a curriculum specification for Leaving Certificate Drama, Film and Theatre Studies.
